component.name: Subtitle Editor
component.summary: GTK+3 tool to edit subtitles for GNU/Linux/*BSD

description.p: Subtitle Editor is a GTK+3 tool to edit subtitles for GNU/Linux/*BSD. It can be used for new subtitles or as a tool to transform, edit, correct and refine existing subtitle. It can play the corresponding video alongside the subtitles using GStreamer. This program also shows sound waves, which makes it easier to synchronize subtitles to voices.
